column4: I've tried to install Kubuntu and Ubuntu and I get this error. I choose reiserfs anyways.. Copying Packages Failed.. Copying packages to the harddisk failed. You may have run out of disk space in the targer /var filesystem.     Check /var/log/syslog or see virtual console 4 for the details can aonyone help me
most likely you screwed up your partitions :) jutst do ubuntu default install... if you ran out of space in var that probably means you made the partition waaaaaaay too small
or you can try to resize the partition if you know how
